title: How many Confederate soldiers were killed at Gettysburg? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depending on what side you were on: Too damn many or not enough. Sadly, Lee was fixated on a set piece battle, and missed the coup de main which would have involved a right flank March putting ANV between Union forces and Washington DC. Read the Newt Gingrich trilogy on the war… fascinating alternative history.
I know of at least one. It was Pvt. John F. Siler of the 22nd North Carolina Rifles who died on the third day of the battle, during Pickett's charge. My wifes great-great-great grandfather.
